Before you can see what the others are Whispering, you also need to share something! The more Whispers you share the more you can receive from others.
Use the \'plus\' icon to add a new whisper, or tap on an existing one to modify it.
Share at least 3 whispers to join the fun!
Please share more whispers! The more you share, the more you can receive.

It seems that you haven’t discovered other users yet.\nGo exploring your surroundings or just carry the device around with you like normally.\nN2U will automatically exchange Whispers when you come close enough to another user!

It seems that you haven’t shared a Whisper yet.\nTap on the top right icon to go to your profile and share a Whisper! Then go exploring your surroundings or just carry the device around with you like normally.\nN2U will automatically exchange Whispers when you come close enough to another user!

The content of your shared whispers, as well as general usage activity will be gathered and may be analyzed by researchers in Tampere University of Technology. This is done solely for academic research purposes..
The content of your shared whispers, as well as general usage activity will be gathered and may be analyzed by researchers in Tampere University of Technology.
All the gathered data will be treated anonymously. Some of the data might be used in scientific publications. We will not disclose any such information that would allow identifying a specific person.

You may at any time stop using N2U and quit the study. To make your whispers no longer available for other users, please go to your Profile and select Deactivate. Note that all the content until this will nevertheless be accessible by the researchers.

We now kindly ask you to fill in your background information and e-mail address that you’re actively following. The contact information will not be linked to any other data about you and is only meant for sending out the questionnaires and possible raffle prizes.
I have read and understood the information about the application and the study, and consent to participate under these terms.
I have read and understood the information about the application and its relation to academic research, and consent to participate under these terms.
N2U is a social mobile app for interacting with people nearby. “Whisper” something – only the people near enough will “hear” it.
Whenever two users get close enough, both will automatically receive a whisper from each other. Just keep your Bluetooth always on!
The Whispers are shared one at a time. The more you meet, the more Whispers you exchange. The more Whispers you share, the more you can also receive.
Exchanging Whispers with the same user can happen once every 2 hours but Messaging can be done at any time.
Be social in a playful way: Collect and explore others’ profiles. Send a Message to them or suggest seeing face-to-face! Earn achievements by doing all this!
Next to You is a research prototype developed at Dep. of Pervasive Computing, Tampere University of Technology. We want to see how it works in the real world!
By using the application, you will be a voluntary participant in academic research. We may analyze the content of your whispers and your general usage activity.
